author: rgardler
msg: Use default Maven repo as well as the local files provided by Wookie

author: rgardler
msg: Allow a local properties file to override build properties.

author: rgardler
msg: Use screen.css instead of common.css for default styling

author: rgardler
msg: Provide a default icon for new widgets. This is a copy of the Wookie logo (would be nice for it to be SVG then we could flash the name of the widget across the icon).

author: rgardler
msg: Make it easier to build and deploy widgets. we can now deploy to a running instance of Wookie using ANT
